textos_fuente.text: Island H2O Water Park | Margaritaville Cottages Orlando Skip to content 321-888-3693 Stay Special Offers About Dine Groups & Events Spa Experiences Things to Do 321-888-3693 Book Now All Accommodations Cottages Villas Resort Info Blog Gallery Video All Dining Options Euphoria Salty Rim Bar & Grill Provisions Cotton Candy ATM Chef & Bartender Experience Grocery Delivery Promenade at Sunset Walk Groups & Events Info Weddings Meetings Explore Our Experiences Enhance Your Stay (Opens a new window) Resort Services Concierge Services Resort Events Browse All Things to Do Activity Guide Location Promenade at Sunset Walk Island H2O Water Park Theme Parks Transportation Car Rental Chill at Home Theme Parks Island H2O Water Park Island H2O Water Park Dive into Fun! Island H2O Water Park uses advanced technology to provide a unique water park experience in Orlando. Guests can customize their experiences and share them with family and friends thanks to these high-tech features. The park is situated right next to the resort and offers over 20 experiences, including thrill rides, a wave pool, a lazy river, and a children‚Äôs area, ensuring entertainment for people of all ages. The private cabanas and adult-only area serve as spots for relaxation for adults while their children play in the park. *Water park hours are subject to change and times may vary. Admission is weather permitting. Please refer to the Island H2O website for the most up-to-date schedule and operating conditions. Visit Website (Opens in a new tab) Park Hours (Opens in a new tab) Complimentary Water Park Admission When you stay at Margaritaville Cottages Orlando now through October 26, 2025 , you receive COMPLIMENTARY ADMISSION to Island H2O Water Park, ranked among the Best Outdoor Water Parks by USA TODAY for four consecutive years. You save $65.99 per person every day of your stay when you visit Island H2O Water Park, located steps away from your private cottage or villa! Plan Your Getaway Frequently Asked Questions If I booked last year for a stay in March, do I qualify for water park access? Complimentary access to Island H2O is available for Cottage & Villas guests with reservations made on or after January 2, 2025. If your reservation was made before these dates, water park access is not included. How can I confirm if the water park is included in my reservation? For assistance, please call Margaritaville Cottages Orlando: 321-888-3401 Does this apply to guests who booked through Airbnb? In most cases, no. Guests must book through Margaritaville Resort Orlando, Margaritaville Cottages Orlando, or V Stays to receive water park access. However, if you booked an Airbnb unit managed by an approved management company (Rentyl or V Stays), you will have access. Is there a shuttle available to and from the water park? Yes, shuttle service is available for guests staying in the cottages/villas. How many tickets do I receive, and how do I pick them up? Water park vouchers will be provided upon check-in, with one voucher per day for each guest on the reservation, up to the maximum room occupancy. Simply present your voucher at the water park entrance to exchange it for tickets. What if my reservation doesn‚Äôt include water park access? Am I able to get discounted tickets? Guests without included water park access can visit the concierge desk in the hotel lobby to purchase discounted tickets to the water park. How do I get my tickets? At check-in, you‚Äôll receive a voucher for each day of your visit. The voucher will include the guest‚Äôs name and the maximum number of guests allowed. Simply present your voucher at the water park entrance to exchange it for tickets. Will I need a voucher for each day of my visit? Yes. At check-in, the front desk agent will ask how many days you plan to visit and provide you with the corresponding number of vouchers. Can I use the ticket on the day of check-in? Yes, you can use the ticket on the day of check-in. Can I visit the park on the day I check-out? Yes, you can! Just let the front desk agent know you need a voucher for that day, and they will provide one. What are the operating days and hours for Island H2O Water Park? For the most up-to-date information on days and hours of operation, please visit the Hours & Park Info page for Island H2O. Can I attend Island H2O's nighttime events with this program? No, these tickets are only valid for regular daytime operating hours. I have questions about Island H2O Water Park. How can I get in touch with them? For more information, please call 407-910-1401 or email [email¬†protected] . Attractions Island H2O Water Park ensures that guests of all ages have a fun time with its options for attractions. Adults and older kids can ride The Downloader for a steep drop. Reload Rapids takes you on twists and turns as you reach the water below. Reply Racers offers you a chance to race your friends at high-speed. If you are looking for a combination of these types of thrills, Profile Plunge is the way to go. Relaxation This park takes parents into consideration with its cabanas designed for resting periods in between activities. Guests can choose between Standard, Suite, and Ultimate Cabana rentals, depending on how much they need to unwind. The cabanas‚Äô amenities provide a luxurious experience for parents, and you can use the private domain pool to cool off after a long day under the sun. Fun for Kids Children who aren‚Äôt ready yet for the drops, twists, and turns of the park‚Äôs larger attractions can find fun at Pelican‚Äôs Paradise. This area offers water adventures in a playground-like environment, and Virtual Village lets children take pictures of their activities to add to the family‚Äôs vacation photo collection. Pelican‚Äôs Paradise has monthly events to ensure unique entertainment for your whole family. Important Guest Reminder To ensure a comfortable experience for all guests, Island H2O Water Park follows the dress code guidelines set by The Promenade at Sunset Walk (opens in a new tab) . Guests must wear coverups, clothing, and shoes when entering or exiting the park, including when walking to or from their vehicle. These guidelines help create a safe and welcoming atmosphere for everyone. Thank you for doing your part to support a respectful environment. Frequently Asked Questions Why Is There a Dress Code Outside the Water Park? Island H2O Water Park is located within The Promenade at Sunset Walk, a public area with shopping, dining, and entertainment. To help maintain a safe, respectful, and family-friendly environment, all guests are asked to wear coverups, clothing, and shoes when moving through these shared spaces. Do I Need to Follow the Dress Code If I'm Just Going to My Car? Yes, the dress code applies at all times when you‚Äôre outside the water park, including when walking to or from your vehicle. This helps ensure a comfortable experience for everyone in public areas. What Is Considered a Coverup? A coverup can be a sundress, a t-shirt with shorts, or any modest clothing worn over swimwear. If it‚Äôs something you‚Äôd feel comfortable wearing in a public shopping or dining area, it works. Where Can I Find the Full Dress Code and Conduct Guidelines? You can view the complete Dress Code Policy and Code of Conduct on The Promenade at Sunset Walk‚Äôs official website. These guidelines include details about attire, guest behavior, and other helpful information to make your visit enjoyable. It‚Äôs a good idea to review them before you arrive. View Full Guidelines (opens in a new tab) What Is the Dress Code Inside Island H2O Water Park? Guests are asked to wear swimwear and clothing that is safe, modest, and appropriate for a family-friendly water park. This helps create a respectful and enjoyable atmosphere for everyone. Island H2O Water Park - Bear‚Äôs Den Resort Orlando Skip to content Stay Special Offers Experiences Golf Groups & Weddings Local Area Blog 407-426-4861 407-426-4861 Book Now Resort Offers Stay More, Save More Dining Chef Experience/Mixology Catering Delivery Grocery Delivery Finns Restaurant Traditions Concierge Resort Information Services Transportation Attraction Tickets Equipment Rentals Activities & Events Tennis Pickleball Footgolf Miniature Golf Golf Cart Rentals Surrey Bike Rentals Upcoming Events Amenities Water Parks Golden Bear Park Fitness Center Spa Rentyl Resort Collection Luxury Golf Experiences & Amenities Private Golf Lessons Driving Range & Putting Greens Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Golf FAQ's Three Championship Golf Courses Jack Nicklaus Course Arnold Palmer Course Tom Watson Course Weddings Meetings Catering Request for Proposal Meeting & Event Venues Orlando Theme Parks Transportation Resort & Area Map Theme Parks Island H2O Water Park Island H2O Water Park Seeking water fun in Orlando has never been easier than at Island H2O Water Park. Attractions come in different forms to meet the thrilling needs of visitors of all ages. Cabanas offer an opportunity to relax in luxury after a day of fun. Those visiting with children will be happy to know about the games available in case they aren‚Äôt ready for the fast slides yet. View our sources of fun to see how Island H2O Water Park can help you create memories during your stay. *Water park hours are subject to change and times may vary. Admission is weather permitting. Please refer to the Island H2O website for the most up-to-date schedule and operating conditions. Island H2O Website (opens in a new tab) Park Schedule (opens in a new tab) Complimentary Water Park Admission When you stay in select featured homes at The Bear‚Äôs Den Resort Orlando now through October 26, 2025 , you will enjoy COMPLIMENTARY ADMISSION to Island H2O Water Park, named one of USA TODAY‚Äôs Best Outdoor Water Parks for four years running. Save $65.99 per person every day of your stay, with the park just a short drive away from your luxury vacation home! Start Planning Frequently Asked Questions If I booked last year for a stay in March, does this apply to me? For The Bear‚Äôs Den Resort Orlando, as long as your stay falls between March 7th and October 26th of 2025, the offer applies, regardless of when the reservation was made. How can I confirm if the water park is included in my reservation? To check if water park access is included, please contact the reservation line for The Bear‚Äôs Den Resort at 407-426-4861 . Are there shuttles from the resort to the water park? Currently, there are no shuttles available. However, parking is available on-site for a fee of $20. How many tickets will I receive, and how do I pick them up? You will receive a voucher for each day of your visit at check-in, based on the maximum occupancy of your room and the number of guests listed on the reservation. Simply present your voucher at the water park entrance to exchange it for tickets. How do I get my tickets? Upon check-in, you will receive a voucher for each day of your visit. The voucher will include the guest‚Äôs name and the maximum number of guests for your reservation. Simply present it at the water park entrance to receive your tickets. Will I need a voucher for each day of my visit? Yes, you will. When you check in, the front desk agent will ask how many days you plan to visit and will provide you with the corresponding number of vouchers. Can I use the ticket on the day of check-in? Yes, you can! The ticket is valid for use on the day of check-in. Can I visit the park on the day I check-out? Yes, you can! Just let the front desk agent know you need a voucher for that day, and they will provide one. What are the operating days and hours for Island H2O Water Park? For the most up-to-date information on the water park‚Äôs operating days and hours, please visit the Hours & Park Info (opens in a new tab) page on the Island H2O website. Can I attend Island H2O's nighttime events with this program? No, these tickets are only valid for regular daytime operating hours and cannot be used for nighttime events. I have questions about Island H2O Water Park. How can I get in touch with them? For more information, please call 407-910-1401 or email [email¬†protected] . Attractions Our park‚Äôs attractions offer thrills in different forms, depending on your preference for water fun. Ride through twists and turns with Reload Rapids, or experience the rush of The Downloader. Race your friends to the bottom of Reply Racers, and take your group through drops and wall sweeps with Profile Plunge. Relaxation Parents and couples in need of downtime after a day of fun can take advantage of the park‚Äôs cabanas. Guests can choose from several luxury options, depending on how many amenities you would like to enjoy. The private domain pool offers a chance to relax while still enjoying the water under the sun. Fun for Kids If your children aren‚Äôt ready for the plunges yet or just want to enjoy some easier entertainment, Pelican‚Äôs Paradise offers several opportunities for water adventures. They can have lunch and share photos of their fun times at Virtual Village. Monthly events take place at the park to offer entertainment for the whole family. Important Guest Reminder To support a positive guest experience, Island H2O Water Park follows the attire guidelines set by The Promenade at Sunset Walk. All guests must wear coverups, clothing, and shoes when entering or exiting the park, including when heading to or from their vehicle. These standards help create a safe, welcoming, and family-friendly atmosphere for everyone. We appreciate your attention to this policy and thank you for being part of a respectful community. Frequently Asked Questions Why Is There a Dress Code Outside the Water Park? Island H2O Water Park is located within The Promenade at Sunset Walk, a public area that features shopping, dining, and entertainment. To help keep the space safe, respectful, and family-friendly, guests are expected to wear proper clothing, including coverups and shoes, when passing through these shared areas. Does This Rule Apply If I'm Just Going to My Car? Yes, the dress code is in effect at all times outside the water park, even if you‚Äôre only walking to or from your vehicle. This helps maintain a comfortable environment for all visitors. What Is Considered a Coverup? A coverup can be any modest clothing worn over swimwear. Examples include a sundress, a t-shirt with shorts, or similar casual attire. If it‚Äôs something you‚Äôd wear in a public shopping or dining area, it‚Äôs likely appropriate. Where Can I Find the Full Dress Code and Conduct Guidelines? The complete Dress Code Policy and Code of Conduct are available on The Promenade at Sunset Walk‚Äôs official website. These documents explain what is expected in terms of attire and behavior to help ensure a positive experience for everyone. It‚Äôs a good idea to review them before your visit. View Full Guidelines (opens in a new tab) What Should I Wear Inside Island H2O Water Park? Guests are asked to wear swimwear and clothing that are modest, safe, and suitable for a family-friendly setting. This helps create a respectful and enjoyable experience for everyone in the park. Island H2O Water Park - Spectrum Resort Orlando Skip to content Stay Special Offers Experiences Groups & Events Local Area Blog 321-888-3875 321-888-3875 Book Now Resort Offers Stay More, Save More Amenities Golf Water Parks Spa Fitness Center Clubhouse Oxygen Bar Dining Restaurants Finns Restaurant Home Delivery Chef & Bartender Experience Catering Grocery Delivery Concierge Resort Information & Services Transportation Attraction Tickets Equipment Rentals Activities Tennis Pickleball Footgolf Miniature Golf Surrey Bike Rentals Upcoming Events Groups Events Weddings Corporate Events Reunions Meeting & Event Venues Orlando Theme Parks Theme Park Tickets Transportation Area Map Theme Parks Island H2O Water Park Island H2O Water Park It's Time to Soak Up the Fun Make a splash with unforgettable family fun at Island H2O Water Park in Kissimmee, Florida! Located just minutes from Spectrum Resort Orlando, this vibrant water park offers the perfect mix of thrills and relaxation for all ages. Brave exhilarating slides like Drop Down and Follow Me Falls for a heart-pounding rush, or take it easy as you float along the lazy river. Younger guests can enjoy splash zones and interactive play areas, while the whole family can cool off in wave pools and unwind in shaded cabanas. Whether you‚Äôre seeking an action-packed day of adventure or a laid-back escape under the sun, Island H2O Water Park is the ultimate destination for fun in the water! Island H2O Website (opens in a new tab)) Park Hours (opens in a new tab)) *Water park hours are subject to change and times may vary. Admission is weather permitting. Please refer to the Island H2O website for the most up-to-date schedule and operating conditions. Complimentary Water Park Admission Stay at Spectrum Resort Orlando now extended through October 26, 2025, and enjoy COMPLIMENTARY ADMISSION to Island H2O Water Park, named one of USA TODAY‚Äôs Best Outdoor Water Parks for four years running. Start Planning Frequently Asked Questions If I booked last year for a stay in March, does this apply to me? For Spectrum Resort Orlando, as long as your stay falls between March 7th and October 26th of 2025, the offer applies, regardless of when the reservation was made. How can I confirm if the water park is included in my reservation? To check if water park access is included, please contact the reservation line for Spectrum Resort Orlando at 407-337-7020 . Are there shuttles from the resort to the water park? Currently, there are no shuttles available. However, parking is available on-site for a fee of $20. How many tickets will I receive, and how do I pick them up? You will receive a voucher for each day of your visit at check-in, based on the maximum occupancy of your room and the number of guests listed on the reservation. Simply present your voucher at the water park entrance to exchange it for tickets. How do I get my tickets? Upon check-in, you will receive a voucher for each day of your visit. The voucher will include the guest‚Äôs name and the maximum number of guests for your reservation. Simply present it at the water park entrance to receive your tickets. Will I need a voucher for each day of my visit? Yes, you will. When you check in, the front desk agent will ask how many days you plan to visit and will provide you with the corresponding number of vouchers. Can I use the ticket on the day of check-in? Yes, you can! The ticket is valid for use on the day of check-in. Can I visit the park on the day I check-out? Yes, you can! Just let the front desk agent know you need a voucher for that day, and they will provide one. What are the operating days and hours for Island H2O Water Park? For the most up-to-date information on the water park‚Äôs operating days and hours, please visit the Hours & Park Info (opens in a new tab) page on the Island H2O website. Can I attend Island H2O's nighttime events with this program? No, these tickets are only valid for regular daytime operating hours and cannot be used for nighttime events. I have questions about Island H2O Water Park. How can I get in touch with them? For more information, please call 407-910-1401 or email [email¬†protected] . Make a Splash Island H2O Water Park guarantees an unforgettable experience for guests of all ages with its thrilling attractions. Adults and older kids can take on The Downloader, featuring a heart-racing drop. Reload Rapids delivers a wild ride filled with twists and turns as you speed toward the splash below. Challenge your friends to a race on Reply Racers for high-speed competition. For the ultimate combination of excitement, don‚Äôt miss Profile Plunge, where thrilling drops and sharp turns come together for an adrenaline-packed adventure. Escape & Refresh Island H2O Water Park has thought of everything for parents looking to relax and recharge. With a variety of cabana options ‚Äî Standard, Suite, and Ultimate ‚Äî you can choose the perfect spot to unwind between adventures. Each cabana is designed for comfort and luxury, offering the ideal space to rest. Plus, enjoy exclusive access to a private pool, perfect for cooling off after a day in the sun. Big Fun for Little Ones For little ones not quite ready for the thrills of the bigger attractions, Pelican‚Äôs Paradise offers a playful water wonderland perfect for their size. This fun-filled area lets kids splash and explore in a safe, interactive environment, while Virtual Village lets them capture photos of their adventures to add to the family album. Plus, with monthly events, Pelican‚Äôs Paradise keeps the entertainment fresh and exciting for the whole family. Important Guest Reminder To help ensure a great experience for all guests, Island H2O Water Park follows the clothing guidelines set by The Promenade at Sunset Walk. Guests are asked to wear appropriate attire including coverups, regular clothing, and shoes‚Äîwhen entering or leaving the park. This includes walking to or from your car. These guidelines are in place to support a safe, respectful, and family-oriented environment. Thank you for helping us maintain a positive atmosphere for everyone. Frequently Asked Questions Why Is There a Dress Code Outside the Water Park? Island H2O Water Park is part of The Promenade at Sunset Walk, which is a public space with restaurants, stores, and entertainment. To keep things safe and family-friendly for everyone, guests are asked to wear clothing, coverups, and shoes when walking through these areas. Do I Still Need to Follow the Dress Code If I'm Just Going to My Car? Yes, the dress code applies anytime you‚Äôre outside the water park, even if you‚Äôre only heading to or from your car. This helps keep the shared spaces comfortable for all visitors. What Can I Use as a Coverup? A coverup is any modest clothing you wear over your swimsuit. This could be a sundress, a t-shirt with shorts, or anything else you‚Äôd feel okay wearing in a public place like a shopping center or restaurant. Where Can I Read the Full Dress Code and Conduct Guidelines? You can find all the details about attire and guest behavior on The Promenade at Sunset Walk‚Äôs official website. These guidelines are there to help everyone have a safe and enjoyable visit. It‚Äôs a good idea to check them out before you arrive. View Full Guidelines (opens in a new tab) What Should I Wear Inside Island H2O Water Park? We ask that guests wear swimwear and clothing that are modest, safe, and appropriate for a family-friendly setting. This helps make sure everyone has a great experience in the park.
